Question: Lablup Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lablup Inc

GenAI Desktop at CES 2024

- GenAI Desktop: a generative AI application integration platform for general users
- Allows applications using AI models to run like desktop apps anywhere
- Users can select and run services without detailed AI knowledge
- Features "Talkativot" app for fine-tuning large language models and using them as chatbots
- Backend.AI FastTrack: MLOps platform simplifying and automating generative AI development for enterprises and research labs
- Manages every step of AI pipeline, from data processing to deploying services
- Available for running AI services at scale on GPU hyperscaler clouds
- Participating in K-Tech Forum@CES 2024 Korea pavilion
- Collaboration with global companies such as NVIDIA, PureStorage, NetApp, and Dell
- Exporting to the UK and Brazil
Summary_cn:
Lablup公司

2024年CES展会上的GenAI Desktop

- GenAI Desktop：面向普通用户的生成式人工智能应用集成平台
- 允许使用人工智能模型的应用程序在任何地方像桌面应用程序一样运行
- 用户可以在没有详细的人工智能知识的情况下选择和运行服务
- 提供“Talkativot”应用程序，用于对大型语言模型进行微调并将其用作聊天机器人
- Backend.AI FastTrack：简化和自动化企业和研究实验室的生成式人工智能开发的MLOps平台
- 管理从数据处理到部署服务的AI流水线的每个步骤
- 可用于在GPU超大规模云上运行规模化的人工智能服务
- 参加K-Tech Forum@CES 2024韩国馆
- 与NVIDIA、PureStorage、NetApp和Dell等全球公司合作
- 出口到英国和巴西
